title: Direct download link for the whole game
body:
I tried few times to download the game the normal way but it just stops or lags and or restart 
Is there's a direct download link for the whole game ?
the whole 6 giga byte , that would be wonderful

replies.body: This wouldn't be caused by the download link if you already have the installer running, but instead a potential connection issue reaching the patching server.  Make sure you have space of course, and run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear up any blocks or snags that could cause delays.  Be sure to let it finish running though, as doing it over would restart the whole process.
